pr_title: [Deployment] Add script to publish documentation to Github Pages website

timeline.message:
[Deployment] Add script to publish documentation to Github Pages website

Add script to publish documentation to Github Pages website

timeline.bodyText: why do you delete the contents you just check out?
timeline.author: surite
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+
+#!/bin/sh
+
+if [ "`git status -s`" ]
+then
+    echo "The working directory is dirty. Please commit any pending changes."
+    exit 1;
+fi
+
+echo "Deleting old publication"
+rm -rf public
+mkdir public
+git worktree prune
+rm -rf .git/worktrees/public/
+
+echo "Checking out gh-pages branch into public"
+git worktree add -B gh-pages public upstream/gh-pages
+
+echo "Removing existing files"
+rm -rf public/*
